15/*! \file */
16
17#include <config.h>
18
19#include <stdbool.h>
20#include <inttypes.h>
21
22#include <isc/mem.h>
23#include <isc/portset.h>
24#include <isc/string.h>
25#include <isc/types.h>
26#include <isc/util.h>
27
28#define ISC_PORTSET_BUFSIZE (65536 / (sizeof(uint32_t) * 8))
29
30/*%
31 * Internal representation of portset. It's an array of 32-bit integers, each
32 * bit corresponding to a single port in the ascending order. For example,
33 * the second most significant bit of buf[0] corresponds to port 1.
34 */
35struct isc_portset {
36 unsigned int nports; /*%< number of ports in the set */
37 uint32_t buf[ISC_PORTSET_BUFSIZE];
38};
39
40static inline bool
41portset_isset(isc_portset_t *portset, in_port_t port) {
42 return ((portset->buf[port >> 5] & ((uint32_t)1 << (port & 31))) != 0);
43}
44
45static inline void
46portset_add(isc_portset_t *portset, in_port_t port) {
47 if (!portset_isset(portset, port)) {
48 portset->nports++;
49 portset->buf[port >> 5] |= ((uint32_t)1 << (port & 31));
50 }
51}
52
53static inline void
54portset_remove(isc_portset_t *portset, in_port_t port) {
55 if (portset_isset(portset, port)) {
56 portset->nports--;
57 portset->buf[port >> 5] &= ~((uint32_t)1 << (port & 31));
58 }
59}
60
61isc_result_t
62isc_portset_create(isc_mem_t *mctx, isc_portset_t **portsetp) {
63 isc_portset_t *portset;
64
65 REQUIRE(portsetp != NULL && *portsetp == NULL);
66
67 portset = isc_mem_get(mctx, sizeof(*portset));
68 if (portset == NULL)
69 return (ISC_R_NOMEMORY);
70
71 /* Make the set 'empty' by default */
72 memset(portset, 0, sizeof(*portset));
73 *portsetp = portset;
74
75 return (ISC_R_SUCCESS);
76}
77
78void
79isc_portset_destroy(isc_mem_t *mctx, isc_portset_t **portsetp) {
80 isc_portset_t *portset;
81
82 REQUIRE(portsetp != NULL);
83 portset = *portsetp;
84
85 isc_mem_put(mctx, portset, sizeof(*portset));
86}
87
88bool
89isc_portset_isset(isc_portset_t *portset, in_port_t port) {
90 REQUIRE(portset != NULL);
91
92 return (portset_isset(portset, port));
93}
94
95unsigned int
96isc_portset_nports(isc_portset_t *portset) {
97 REQUIRE(portset != NULL);
98
99 return (portset->nports);
100}
101
102void
103isc_portset_add(isc_portset_t *portset, in_port_t port) {
104 REQUIRE(portset != NULL);
105
106 portset_add(portset, port);
107}
108
109void
110isc_portset_remove(isc_portset_t *portset, in_port_t port) {
111 portset_remove(portset, port);
112}
113
114void
115isc_portset_addrange(isc_portset_t *portset, in_port_t port_lo,
116 in_port_t port_hi)
117{
118 in_port_t p;
119
120 REQUIRE(portset != NULL);
121 REQUIRE(port_lo <= port_hi);
122
123 p = port_lo;
124 do {
125 portset_add(portset, p);
126 } while (p++ < port_hi);
127}
128
129void
130isc_portset_removerange(isc_portset_t *portset, in_port_t port_lo,
131 in_port_t port_hi)
132{
133 in_port_t p;
134
135 REQUIRE(portset != NULL);
136 REQUIRE(port_lo <= port_hi);
137
138 p = port_lo;
139 do {
140 portset_remove(portset, p);
141 } while (p++ < port_hi);
142}
